option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="28" />
<!-- Hardware feature for camera --> <uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="false" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/skymall_logo" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/skymall_logo_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SkyMall" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="31">
<activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SkyMall"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".ui.profile.EditProfileActivity" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" android:parentActivityName=".MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".auth.LoginActivity" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize"/>
<activity android:name=".auth.RegisterActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.payment.PaymentActivity" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" android:parentActivityName=".MainActivity" />
<!-- FileProvider cho chụp ảnh --> <provider android:name="androidx.core.content.FileProvider" android:authorities="com.example.skymall.fileprovider" android:exported="false" android:grantUriPermissions="true"> <meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="@xml/file_paths" /> </provider>
</application> </manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="28" />
<!-- Hardware feature for camera --> <uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="false" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/skymall_logo" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/skymall_logo_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SkyMall" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="31">
<activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SkyMall"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".ui.profile.EditProfileActivity" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" android:parentActivityName=".MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".auth.LoginActivity" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize"/>
<activity android:name=".auth.RegisterActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.payment.PaymentActivity" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" android:parentActivityName=".MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.notification.NotificationActivity" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" android:parentActivityName=".MainActivity" />
<!-- FileProvider cho chụp ảnh --> <provider android:name="androidx.core.content.FileProvider" android:authorities="com.example.skymall.fileprovider" android:exported="false" android:grantUriPermissions="true"> <meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="@xml/file_paths" /> </provider>
</application> </manifest>

option.value: <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24" android:tint="@android:color/white"> <path android:fillColor="@android:color/white" android:pathData="M19,6.41L17.59,5 12,10.59 6.41,5 5,6.41 10.59,12 5,17.59 6.41,19 12,13.41 17.59,19 19,17.59 13.41,12z"/> </vector>
